name: Blankout
description:
Navigate a void-like maze of office decor.

Blankout is made up of five short levels and can be completed in around 10 minutes.  The levels experiment with the mechanic of using objects to find your way, with solid colored rooms being an obstacle.

There are 20 paintings scattered around that can be collected for something extra ;)

Controls:

Movement / WASD

Pick Up / Mouse

Mouse Settings/ M

[In mouse settings]

Moving the mouse back and forth changes the sensitivity

Invert Mouse / I

Toggle Cursor/C
